duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete preventive maintenance on trucks and heavy equipment, including hydraulic systems.
Read and diagnose diagnostic codes for vehicles and equipment.
Identify, locate, and diagnose the components of truck brake systems, including hydraulic and air brake systems.
Schedule repairs and maintenance of equipment.
Work in a clean orderly manner and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: One (1) years’ experience as a mechanic/shop maintenance mechanic. Candidates with military service or trade school graduation are also considered.
